title: Seeing if the First Term is Positive or Negative
text: The first term, which is $$-1$$, is a negative number.
speech: The first term, which is  minus 1 , is a negative number.
pacedSpeech: The first term, which is   minus 1

title: Seeing if the Second Term is Positive or Negative
text: The second term, which is $$-4$$, is a negative number.
speech: The second term, which is  minus 4 , is a negative number.
pacedSpeech: The second term, which is   minus 4

title: Adding Two Negative Numbers
text: One negative plus four negatives equals five negatives. The visual representation of this is attached to this hint.\n##figure2.gif##
speech: One negative plus four negatives equals five negatives. The visual representation of this is attached to this hint.\n##figure2.gif##
pacedSpeech: One negative plus four negatives equals five negatives. The visual representation of this is attached to this hint.##figure2.gif##
